home_description: Discover your compatibility by answering {questionCount} questions. It's a journey into the heart of your connection.
home_step1: Answer {questionCount} questions about your preferences, values, and personality.
home_step2: Receive a unique code representing your answers.
home_step3: Share your code with your partner and get theirs in return.
home_step4: Enter both codes to see your detailed compatibility report.
user_result_description: You've successfully answered all the questions. Here is your unique code. Share it with your partner to compare your results.
user_result_next_step_description: Ask your partner to complete the quiz and share their code with you. Then, proceed to the comparison.
comparison_error_invalid_code: One or both of the codes are invalid. Please check and try again.
comparison_error_same_code: You cannot compare the same code with itself. Please enter two different codes.
comparison_description: Paste your code and your partner's code below to reveal your compatibility score.
comparison_placeholder_2: Paste your partner's encoded data here...
result_summary_strengths: You two share a strong connection in {categories}. This is a fantastic foundation for your relationship.
result_summary_growth_areas: You have different perspectives in {categories}. These are opportunities for growth and understanding each other better.
result_summary_balanced: You have a balanced mix of similarities and differences across all areas. This can make for a dynamic and interesting relationship.
result_summary_strengths_only_ending: Continue nurturing these shared values and perspectives!
result_summary_growth_only_ending: Exploring these differences with open communication can strengthen your bond.
